SEARCH
Package com.bitwig.extension.controller.api

Interface HardwareLight

All Superinterfaces:
HardwareElement, HardwareOutputElement
All Known Subinterfaces:
MultiStateHardwareLight, OnOffHardwareLight
public interface HardwareLight extends HardwareOutputElement
Defines a hardware light. There are 2 kinds of lights: OnOffHardwareLight and MultiStateHardwareLight.
Since:
API version 10
